lines.text: Model: Afghan belief that Pastitun identity transcends
Westphalian borders
· Ideological rejection: regime's refusal to recognize the
1893 Durand Line as an international border, direct
assertion of sovereignty, reviving the 'Pashtunistan,
issue.
· Active resistance: resists Pakistan's border fencing,
Supporting local militias like Lash kar-e-Durand_, turning
border management into an active nationalist conflict
· Islamic Emirate model: uses horder dispute as a populist
Pool to unite Afghan Pashtuns around an identity that
transcends modern borders.
2.3) Backfiring of Pakistan's border closure: Kabul's
enhanced pursuit of economic independence through
alternative trade routes
· Reduced leverage: Pakistan's historical use of trade
dependence is failing, Taliban develops alternative routes
and independent mining deals.
· Consequences: Undermines Pakistan's role as a regional
trade hub, hurting its border economies, turning a tool
of pressure into a source of vulnerability
· Border closure: attempts to weaponice trade via border
closures have backfired, Taliban adopts a harder
Stance against Pakistan
2.4) The Nationalist Narrative: Weaponizing anti-Pakistan
CamScanner

ocr_full_text_page: Model: Afghan belief that Pastitun identity transcends Westphalian borders · Ideological rejection: regime's refusal to recognize the 1893 Durand Line as an international border, direct assertion of sovereignty, reviving the 'Pashtunistan, issue. · Active resistance: resists Pakistan's border fencing, Supporting local militias like Lash kar-e-Durand_, turning border management into an active nationalist conflict · Islamic Emirate model: uses horder dispute as a populist Pool to unite Afghan Pashtuns around an identity that transcends modern borders. 2.3) Backfiring of Pakistan's border closure: Kabul's enhanced pursuit of economic independence through alternative trade routes · Reduced leverage: Pakistan's historical use of trade dependence is failing, Taliban develops alternative routes and independent mining deals. · Consequences: Undermines Pakistan's role as a regional trade hub, hurting its border economies, turning a tool of pressure into a source of vulnerability · Border closure: attempts to weaponice trade via border closures have backfired, Taliban adopts a harder Stance against Pakistan 2.4) The Nationalist Narrative: Weaponizing anti-Pakistan CS CamScanner
